subject: Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: The Baltimore Orioles broke ranks with the other 29 major league clubs and Commissioner Bud Selig by questioning George J. Mitchell’s findings on the use of performance-enhancing drugs in baseball.
snippet: The Baltimore Orioles broke ranks with the other 29 major league clubs and Commissioner Bud Selig by questioning George J. Mitchell’s findings on the use of performance-enhancing drugs in baseball.
